events.message: I placed an order two weeks ago, but my package still hasn't arrived and there's no update on the tracking information.
The issue has been identified and categorized under Delivery Delay based on the customer's report mentioning late delivery and lack of tracking updates.
The case has been assigned to a customer support agent specialized in resolving shipping and delivery issues.
Hello! Thank you for contacting us. I understand your order hasn't arrived yet and you haven't received tracking updates. I'm here to help.
Could you please provide your order number and the name used on the purchase so I can check the status of your shipment?
Sure, my order number is 123456789 and the name on the order is Jane Doe. Please let me know what’s causing the delay.
After checking, it seems the shipment was delayed due to a logistics issue. We expect your package to arrive within the next 3 days. We appreciate your patience.
I’m disappointed this happened as I needed the item sooner, but I appreciate the update. I hope it arrives soon without further delays.
Due to the significant delay, the case is being escalated to the senior logistics team for closer monitoring and assistance.
Your package has now been delivered. We apologize for the delay and are glad to confirm receipt of your order.
Just checking in to ensure you received your order and that everything is satisfactory. Please reach out if you need further assistance.
We are closing this case as your issue has been resolved. Thank you for your patience and for contacting our support team.
